content: मंगल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंग्-अलच्; <ls>Uṇ. 5. 70</ls>] {@--1@} Auspicious, lucky, propitious, fortunate; as in मंगलदिवसः, मंगलवृषभः &c. {@--2@} Prosperous, doing or faring well. {@--3@} Brave. --लं {@--1@} ({%a%}) Auspiciousness, propitiousness: जनकानां रघूणां च यत्कृत्स्नं गोत्रमंगलं <ls>U. 6. 42</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 9</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 67.</ls> ({%b%}) Happiness, good luck or fortune, bliss, felicity; भद्रं भद्रं वितर भगवन् भूयसे मंगलाय <ls>Māl. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 48.</ls> ({%e%}) Well-being, welfare, good; संगः सतां किमु न मंगलमातनोति <ls>Bv. 1. 122</ls>; (also {%<ab>m.</ab>%} in these senses). {@--2@} A good omen, anything tending to an auspicious issue. {@--3@} A blessing, benediction. {@--4@} An auspicious or lucky object. {@--5@} An auspicious occasion or event, a festivity. {@--6@} Any solemn or auspicious ceremony or rite (such as marriage). {@--7@} Any ancient custom. {@--8@} Turmeric. --लः {@--1@} The planet Mars. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agni. --ला --ली {@--1@} A faithful wife. {@--2@} Dūrvā grass. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
